channel.title: Random Items and Eating Help!
channel.description:
[b]Reciving Random Items[/b] How do I make a stall give me a random item?
[i]Example: Baker's Stall: chocolate cake Cake 1/3 slice cake ect.[/i]
please help
thank you ::kidd619::
------------------------------break------------------------------
[b]Eating[/b] How do I make an item get eaten when you click "Eat"
and when i eat it, how do i make it heal you?
